original_text: I have seen people do disgusting things in Israel. Like a prostitute, Ephraim's people serve false gods. Yes, the Israelites have made themselves unclean. I have seen people do disgusting things in Israel.
korean_text: 내가 이스라엘 집에서 가증한 일을 보았나니 거기서 에브라임은 음행하였고 이스라엘은 더럽혀졌느니라

sentences.original_text: I have seen people do disgusting things
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 사람들이 역겨운 일을 하는 것을 보았다

sentences.original_text: the Israelites have made themselves unclean
I have seen people do disgusting things
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 사람들이 역겨운 일을 하는 것을 보았다
